Articles.Content:
I'm on Lego Ideas as DM01.

You can support my Micro series, which will be cool (I hope)!

Anyone else have accounts?

Anyone else build Lego?
G'day mate! I remember seeing another forum which was about lego KSP. I forgot where it was though. Maybe someone else will put it up. But, I loved me some Legos as a kid!
Too bad the Kerbal X one was expired. I loved that thing.
There was also a Maven one. It was a very cool idea, but it also expired https://ideas.lego.com/projects/53221
We should try a kerbal X again.

I'm GreenLead on Lego Ideas (and its predecessor, Lego CUUSOO).

I was one of the contributors for Nick Royer's Space Troopers! project, which reached the required 10,000 votes, but ultimately did not reach production.

I also used to publish building instructions and run my own LEGO Modern Military fansite called Alpha Company, but that didn't turn out too well because I focused too much on storytelling and almost not enough actual building, so it wasn't too popular with pre-teens on a limited budget, and I closed the site down earlier this year.

Edited July 14, 2015 by sumghai

I'm GreenLead on Lego Ideas (and its predecessor, Lego CUUSOO).

I was one of the contributors for Nick Royer's Space Troopers! project, which reached the required 10,000 votes, but ultimately did not reach production.

I also used to publish building instructions and run my own LEGO Modern Military fansite called Alpha Company, but that didn't turn out too well because I focused too much on storytelling and almost not enough actual building, so it wasn't too popular with pre-teens on a limited budget, and I closed the site down earlier this year.

Cool!

Nice to see there is one other person...

Anyone else have accounts?

I have an account but I'm just a supporter. I don't have any of my own projects.
